short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Caro Bro, your Health pal, will remind you to take care of your health.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Caro Bro, your Health pal, will remind you to take care of your health.
The idea behind this extension is to bring awareness among people who continue to live round the clock and work in front of computers, laptops and other electronic devices without really taking care of their health. Caro Bro, your health pal will now remind you to take frequent breaks from work and stay healthy.
